title: L'Orange
brief_description: Filmed on location at Fitzroy High School by Year 9 students this short film parodies French arthouse cinema through its photography, movement and sound. Whimsical and somewhat amusing. Voiceover in French - no subtitles. Original soundtrack by Tom Noonan.
